item.title: Features
item.description: FEATURES # F-string # f'{expr=}' 的 f-字符串将扩展表示为表达式文本，加一个等于号，再加表达式的求值结果 指定了转换符，表达式的求值结果会先转换再格式化 des = 'string' f'this is a {des}' # this is a string f'{des = }' # des = string # '!r' 为调用 repr() name = "Fred" f"He said his name is {name!r}." # "He said his name is 'Fred'." # '!s' 即对结果调用 str() # '!a' 为调用 ascii() width = 10 precision = 4 value = decimal.Decimal("12.34567") f"result: {value:{width}.{precision}}" # nested fields 'result: 12.
